bind.calculate: concat(if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m1_group/m1_a_5 = '1', 'M1 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m2_group/m2_a_5 = '1', 'M2 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m3_group/m3_a_5 = '1', 'M3 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m4_group/m4_a_5 = '1', 'M4 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m5_group/m5_a_5 = '1', 'M5 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m6_group/m6_a_5 = '1', 'M6 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m7_group/m7_a_5 = '1', 'M7 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m8_group/m8_a_5 = '1', 'M8 ', ''))

concat(if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m1_group/m1_a_6 = '1', 'M1 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m2_group/m2_a_6 = '1', 'M2 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m3_group/m3_a_6 = '1', 'M3 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m4_group/m4_a_6 = '1', 'M4 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m5_group/m5_a_6 = '1', 'M5 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m6_group/m6_a_6 = '1', 'M6 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m7_group/m7_a_6 = '1', 'M7 ', ''), if( /FarmFieldSoils_v1/a_group/m8_group/m8_a_6 = '1', 'M8 ', ''))

bind.jr:constraintMsg: You must select an eligible first field. If there is none, select None.
